get.description: Get a single clip's full details

schema.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.name: clipId

schema.description: A unique identifier for a clip

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a clip

parameters.name: clipSlug

schema.description: The text identifier slug for a clip

parameters.description: The text identifier slug for a clip

parameters.name: language

schema.description: The language of the clip details

parameters.description: The language of the clip details

parameters.name: _data

schema.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$clipId.$clipSlug"

get.description: Get a paginated list of a studio's clips. Page size is fixed at 20, changing limit in url will not have any effect.

parameters.name: studioId

schema.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.name: studioSlug

schema.description: The text identifier slug for a studio

parameters.description: The text identifier slug for a studio

parameters.name: language

schema.description: The language of the clip details

parameters.description: The language of the clip details

parameters.name: sort

schema.description: The sort order of the clip search results

parameters.description: The sort order of the clip search results

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search term to filter clip results by. Must start with a '/' character to account for optional path parameter.

parameters.description: Search term to filter clip results by. Must start with a '/' character to account for optional path parameter.

parameters.name: category

schema.description: The category ID to filter the search by. Setting the value to 0 will filter by all categories.

parameters.description: The category ID to filter the search by. Setting the value to 0 will filter by all categories.

parameters.name: _data

schema.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$studioSlug.$"

parameters.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$studioSlug.$"

parameters.name: onlyClips

schema.description: Whether to return only the studio's clips. If omitted, the response will include studio details. Note: passing any value to this param will be interpreted as true, so passing 'false' as no effect

parameters.description: Whether to return only the studio's clips. If omitted, the response will include studio details. Note: passing any value to this param will be interpreted as true, so passing 'false' as no effect
